title: Permit and Visa Transfer FAQs
content_markdown:
#  Permit and Visa Transfer FAQs 

Modified on: Fri, 16 Sep, 2022 at 7:55 PM

## This service is provided by the office of the Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration (DGIE).

## The following are the most frequently asked questions about the permit and visa transfer: 

  1. ## I am a foreigner who works in Rwanda with a valid permit but I changed my passport. Do I apply for a new permit?

No, you should rather apply for the Permit and Visa transfer service, to have it reflected on your new passport.

  2. ## Do I need an IremboGov account to apply for the Permit and Visa Transfer?

No, you can apply for this service without an IremboGov account.

  3. ## How much do I pay for the Permit and Visa Transfer?

The price of this service is 18,050 Rwf

  4. ## What are the requirements to apply for the Permit and Visa Transfer?

Applicants should have lost/damaged or expired passports and acquired a new passport. A valid phone number, email address, or both.

  5. ## What documents do I need to apply for a Permit and Visa Transfer? 

In case of a lost, damaged or expired passport, you will need to attach the following documents to your application:

1\. Passport photo

2\. Application letter (Addressed to DGIE requesting a visa/permit transfer)

3\. New passport copy

4\. Copy of previous visa/permit 

In the case of a lost or stolen passport, you will need all the above along with a declaration of a lost passport issued by RIB.

  

  6. ## What is the size and format of attachments allowed to be uploaded on IremboGov?

1\. The size of the letter, new passport, and copy of the previous visa/permit and all the certificates should be 500kb, format: PDF

2\. The size of the passport photo should be 500kb, format: JPG

  7. ## Do I need to pick up my new document from the collection office I chose during the application process? 

Yes, you will visit the immigration offices that you chose in the application.

  8. ## What is the processing time for the Permit and Visa Transfer?

## The processing time of permit and visa transfer is 7 days.

  9. ## I paid an application for a Permit and Visa transfer but it took longer to receive the confirmation message. What should I do?

You will contact the DGIE support team. Click [here](<https://www.migration.gov.rw/contact-us>) for more information.
